translation.en: OPTIMUS: Earth, birthplace of the human race,

translation.en: a species much like our own,

translation.en: capable of great compassion

translation.en: For in our quest to protect the humans,

translation.en: Our worlds have met before.
translation.ja: 出会ったことが あると分かった

translation.en: You gotta wonder,

translation.en: if God made us in his image, who made him?

translation.en: General, our alliance has countermanded six Decepticon incursions this year,

translation.en: "The Fallen." Meaning what?

translation.en: OPTIMUS: Origin unknown. The only recorded history of our race
translation.ja: 分からない 我々の歴史を記した オールスパークは―

translation.en: was contained within the AllSpark
translation.ja: 我々の歴史を記した オールスパークは―

translation.en: and lost with its destruction.
translation.ja: 壊れて失われた

translation.en: Excuse me!
translation.ja: ちょっと いいか？

translation.en: With this so-called AllSpark now destroyed,

translation.en: why hasn't the enemy left the planet like you thought they would?

translation.en: Director Galloway, our National Security Advisor. The President just appointed him liaison.

translation.en: Excuse me. Coming through.

translation.en: Excuse me. Excuse me, soldier.

translation.en: Now, under the classified Alien/Autobot Cooperation Act,
translation.ja: 機密協力協定により 君たちオートボットは―

translation.en: you agreed to share your intel with us, but not your advancements in weaponry.
translation.ja: 情報提供に合意したが 武器提供は合意してない

translation.ja: 観察の結果 人間が武器を使うと―

translation.en: But who are you to judge what's best for us?

translation.en: With all due respect, we've been fighting side by side in the field for two years.
translation.ja: 彼らとは２年間 共に戦ってきました

translation.en: We've shed blood, sweat and precious metal together.

translation.en: Soldier, you're paid to shoot, not talk.

translation.en: Don't tempt me.

translation.en: GALLOWAY: And the newest members of your team.
translation.ja: チームの新メンバーを…

translation.en: OPTIMUS: Easy.

translation.en: an open invitation to come to Earth,

translation.en: vetted by no one at the White House.

translation.en: Let me stop you right there, Mr. Galloway. It was vetted right here.

translation.en: has always been above reproach.
translation.ja: 非の打ち所がない

translation.en: Well, be that as it may, General, it is the position of the President that when our national security is at stake,

translation.en: no one is above reproach.

translation.en: classified NBE One, aka Megatron,

translation.en: LEO: You need to listen to this, man. You gotta check this out.
translation.ja: おい　これを見てみろ

translation.en: They have a picture of me, man. We're dead, bro. FBI, CIA, we are wanted fugitives now.
translation.ja: 俺は おしまいだ ＦＢＩとＣＩＡに追われてる

translation.en: I just need you to focus for one minute, man. -Just stop. -This thing has blown up
translation.ja: ケタ違いの事態に なっちまった

translation.en: to a whole other level, all right? Give me this thing. They can track us.
translation.ja: それを貸せ 逆探知されるぞ

translation.en: They can track us? Like, satellite track us?
translation.ja: 逆探知？ 衛星を使って？ 俺は君の仲間じゃない

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Okay, I'm not even with you guys!
translation.ja: 衛星を使って？ 俺は君の仲間じゃない

translation.en: Technically, I'm like a hostage. This is kidnapping...
translation.ja: 俺は人質みたいなもんだ

translation.en: -Enough is... -MUDFLAP: Yo, Leo!
translation.ja: レオ！

translation.en: This thing's gonna give me a heart attack, I swear.
translation.ja: 心臓発作を起こしそうだ

translation.en: You guys forced me into that car, right?
translation.ja: ムリに連れてこられ…

translation.en: I think he's scared.
translation.ja: 怯えてる

translation.en: Hey, Mudflap, what are we gonna do with this shrimp taco?
translation.ja: こいつを どうする？ ケツを撃って トランクに入れる？

translation.en: Let's pop a cap in his ass, throw him in the trunk
translation.ja: ケツを撃って トランクに入れる？

translation.en: and then nobody gonna know nothing, know what I mean?
translation.ja: ケツを撃って トランクに入れる？ ダメだ

translation.en: -Not in my trunk. -Bumper cars? I'm hearing you.
translation.ja: うるさい お前たちの話は 聞こえてるんだぞ

translation.en: Okay? I'm right here and I can hear you.
translation.ja: お前たちの話は 聞こえてるんだぞ

translation.en: No one's popping any caps in any asses, okay? I've had a hell of a day.
translation.ja: 撃たれてたまるか 散々 ひどい目に遭った

translation.en: Why don't you get a haircut with your bitch ass?
translation.ja: 髪を切ったらどうだ

translation.en: Go whine to your boyfriend.
translation.ja: 情けねえ

translation.en: Listen, Sam, I know what I'm gonna do, man.
translation.ja: 俺は決めたぞ

translation.en: Go to the authorities and tell them the truth. I had nothing to do with this.
translation.ja: 警察に全部 話す 共犯はゴメンだ

translation.en: Hey, you wanted this, right? You wanted the real deal? That's what this is.
translation.ja: 真実を知りたがってたろ？

translation.en: Wake up. You're in the middle of it! You want to run? Go ahead! No one's stopping you.
translation.ja: 真実を目の前にして 逃げたけりゃ逃げろ

translation.en: Stop complaining.
translation.ja: 黙って行け

translation.en: RATCHET: What is the meaning of this?
translation.ja: これは何だ？

translation.en: You dare point a gun at me?
translation.ja: 銃を向けるのか？

translation.en: You want a piece of me? I will tear you apart!
translation.ja: 俺と戦う気か？ 八つ裂きにするぞ

translation.en: Drop your weapons! Drop your weapons!
translation.ja: 武器を捨てるんだ！

translation.en: -Tell them to lower their weapons. -Tell them first.
translation.ja: “武器を下ろせ”と言え！

translation.en: Tell them to lower their weapons. Major, there's nothing I can do. Talk to him.
translation.ja: 私でなく 彼に言え

translation.en: Your NEST team is deactivated, Major.
translation.ja: ネスト部隊は解散だ

translation.en: You are to cease anti-Decepticon operations and return to Diego Garcia pending further orders.
translation.ja: 対ディセプティコン作戦は 中止する　基地へ戻れ

translation.en: No, we take our orders directly from Chairman Morshower, sir.
translation.ja: 将軍の命令を受けてる

translation.en: Well, I'll see your Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff and I will raise you a President of the United States.
translation.ja: こっちは大統領からの 命令を受けてるんだ

translation.en: I have operational command now.
translation.ja: 私が指揮をとる

translation.en: An alien blood feud has been brought to our shores for which our soldiers are paying the price.
translation.ja: エイリアン同士の戦いで 兵士が死んでる

translation.en: The secret is out.
translation.ja: 今や これは我々の戦争だ

translation.en: This is our war now and we will win it as we always have,
translation.ja: 今や これは我々の戦争だ 今回も我々は勝つ

translation.en: with a coordinated military strategy.
translation.ja: 戦術を駆使してな

translation.en: This fool is terribly misinformed.
translation.ja: このバカは 大きな勘違いをしてる

translation.en: You're gonna need every asset that you've got.
translation.ja: 緊急事態だ

translation.en: What we need is to draw up battle plans while we explore every possible diplomatic solution.
translation.ja: 作戦を練り直し 外交的解決法を探る

translation.en: Like what, handing over the kid?
translation.ja: “サムを渡す”とか？

translation.en: All options are being considered.
translation.ja: あらゆる手を考える

translation.en: Whatever the Decepticons are after, this is just the start.
translation.ja: 敵の攻撃は これから激しくなります

translation.en: There is no negotiating with them.
translation.ja: 交渉など不可能だ

translation.en: I'm ordering you to stand down.
translation.ja: 命令だ　黙っていろ

translation.en: You won't be needing this anymore.
translation.ja: これは もう必要ない

translation.en: Get your assets back to base.
translation.ja: 基地に戻るんだ

translation.en: And take that pile of scrap metal back to Diego Garcia.
translation.ja: あのスクラップも 持って行け

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: I really don't like that dude. He's an asshole.
translation.ja: 気に食わねえ奴だ 最低のクズだ

translation.en: MAN ON PA: Autobots, report to hangar for transport.
translation.ja: オートボット　格納庫へ

translation.en: Ironhide, we should leave this planet.
translation.ja: 地球を離れるべきでは？

translation.en: That's not what Optimus would want.
translation.ja: オプティマスなら 地球に残る

translation.en: There's nothing that you could have done.
translation.ja: どうにもできなかった

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ ええ

translation.en: Bee, if you hate me, I understand.
translation.ja: ビー　君は 僕を恨んでるだろう

translation.en: I messed up. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 僕のせいだ すまない

translation.en: Young fella, you are the person I care about most in my life.
translation.ja: それでも― 君は― 僕の一番大切な人だ

translation.en: If there's anything you need, I won't be far away.
translation.ja: 必要な時は そばにいるよ

translation.en: He's dead because of me. He came here to protect me and he's dead.
translation.ja: 彼は僕を守ろうとして 命を落とした

translation.en: There's some things you just can't change.
translation.ja: 変えられないこともある

translation.en: So, his sacrifice for us would not have been in vain. Hallelujah!
translation.ja: 彼の犠牲を ムダにしてはならない

translation.en: I'm gonna make it right. I'm going to turn myself in.
translation.ja: 僕が身を差し出す

translation.en: We... We've got to stick together.
translation.ja: 団結せねば

translation.en: You're not going to do that.
translation.ja: 行かせないわ

translation.en: Yes, I am.
translation.ja: 僕は行く

translation.en: BUMBLEBEE: Everything we worked for will be wiped out in one day
translation.ja: 我々の これまでの努力は １日で泡と消える

translation.en: -You two... -BOTH: Huh?
translation.ja: 君たち

translation.en: Hey, you know the glyphs? These? The symbols that have been rattling around in my head?
translation.ja: 僕の頭に浮かんだ文字が 読めるか？

translation.en: That's old school, yo. That's, like... That's Cybertronian.
translation.ja: こいつは古い言葉だ サイバトロン語だよ

translation.en: That's some serious stuff, right there.
translation.ja: こいつは難解だ

translation.en: They gotta mean something, like a message or like a map.
translation.ja: 何らかのメッセージか 地図だ

translation.en: Like a map to an Energon source. Can you read this?
translation.ja: エネルゴンの ありかが 分かる

translation.en: Read? No. We don't really do much reading. Not so much.
translation.ja: これを読めって？ 読むのは得意じゃねえ

translation.en: If you can't read it, we gotta find somebody who can.
translation.ja: 読める者を探そう

translation.en: Look who came sashaying back.
translation.ja: この野郎　戻ってきたぞ

translation.en: Hair growing like a Chia Pet. Look at him.
translation.ja: 髪がムサいな

translation.en: I had a bit of a mild panic attack earlier, right?
translation.ja: 軽いパニック状態になって

translation.en: I think I'm allowed that, considering what I've been through.
translation.ja: 仕方ないよな　あの状況だ

translation.en: I heard you have a problem. I think I know someone who can help.
translation.ja: それを読める人間を 知ってる

translation.en: -Who? -Robo-Warrior.
translation.ja: 誰だ？ ロボ･ウォリアー

translation.en: LEO: This guy, Robo-Warrior, everything about anything alien, he's supposed to know.
translation.ja: “ロボ･ウォリアー”なら 何でも知ってる

translation.en: One time we revenge-hacked his site
translation.ja: 前に奴のサイトを ハッキングした時に見た

translation.en: and maybe I saw some of your alien drawings or whatever.
translation.ja: 前に奴のサイトを ハッキングした時に見た エイリアン文字を

translation.en: This is it. Yep.
translation.ja: ここだよ

translation.en: -Deli. -Good front
translation.ja: デリか　いい偽装だ

translation.en: All right, wait here. I'll give you the go/no go. All right?
translation.ja: ここで俺の合図を待て

translation.en: Number 42, we got your kishka, knish,
translation.ja: 42番のお客さん キシュカ･クニッシュ･ コンボだ

translation.en: kasha-varnishka and kreplach combo right here.
translation.ja: キシュカ･クニッシュ･ コンボだ 待たせたね

translation.en: Cash only. Who's next?
translation.ja: 現金だけだ

translation.en: I told you to cure the lox in the brine and then smoke it.
translation.ja: サケは塩漬けしてから スモークだよ

translation.en: Ma, you want me to cut my hand off, or what?
translation.ja: ママ　危ないよ

translation.en: You... You ruined a beautiful piece of fish, you retard!
translation.ja: 魚が台無しだよ ナイフさばきを見せてるんだ

translation.en: I'm like a ninja with a blade. It's an art form.
translation.ja: ナイフさばきを見せてるんだ

translation.en: Give me your money. Get out of here. Hey, Sal. Watch your reach, huh? Take a number, young man.
translation.ja: サル　手を出すな 番号札を取って並べ

translation.en: Robo-Warrior.
translation.ja: “ロボ･ウォリアー”

translation.en: Know him?
translation.ja: 知ってるか？

translation.en: I never heard of him.
translation.ja: 初耳だ

translation.en: You never heard of TheRealEffingDeal.com?
translation.ja: “リアル･スクープ･ ドットコム”は？

translation.en: You must be talking about that amateur-hour blog operation
translation.ja: ああ　素人がやってる―

translation.en: with Game Boy-level security.
translation.ja: セキュリティーが甘い ブログか

translation.en: Robo-Warrior.
translation.ja: ロボ･ウォリアー

translation.en: It's him. It's him. That's the guy right there. That's him.
translation.ja: こいつがそうだ！ この男だ！

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: そんな…

translation.en: You got to be kidding me.
translation.ja: 冗談だろ

translation.en: All right, meat store's closed. Everybody out. Out, right now.
translation.ja: もう閉店だ 皆 出てってくれ

translation.en: WOMAN: When he says to go, you go. That means you, lady, right now.
translation.ja: さあ 奥さん 早く店から出ろ

translation.en: Wait a minute. You know this guy?
translation.ja: 知ってるのか？

translation.en: -We're old friends. -Old friends?
translation.ja: 旧友だよ お前のせいで セクター７は解散した

translation.en: You're the case that shut down Sector Seven,
translation.ja: お前のせいで セクター７は解散した

translation.en: got the kibosh, disbanded. No more security clearance, no retirement, no nothing.
translation.ja: 機密情報へのアクセス権も 退職金も失ったんだぞ

translation.en: All 'cause of you and your little criminal girlfriend.
translation.ja: お前と犯罪女のせいだ

translation.en: Look at her now, so mature.
translation.ja: 大人になったな

translation.en: Moron. Where's the whitefish?
translation.ja: マヌケ！　白身魚はどこ？

translation.en: Hey! Don't touch me with the pig.
translation.ja: 豚肉ぶつけるな！

translation.en: -SIMMONS: Yakov. -What?
translation.ja: ヤコフ！ 何だ！

translation.en: You don't get Christmas bonuses standing around. You want those new teeth you saw on SkyMall?
translation.ja: サボるとボーナスなしだ 歯を入れたいんだろ？

translation.en: It's my dream.
translation.ja: もちろん！

translation.en: Help her out.
translation.ja: 働け！

translation.en: -You live with your mama? -No, my mama lives with me.
translation.ja: ママと同居？ ママが私と同居してる テレビに出てるぞ

translation.en: It's a big difference. They got your face all over the news,alien boy.
translation.ja: ママが私と同居してる テレビに出てるぞ

translation.en: -Yeah, I know. -And NBE One's still kicking?
translation.ja: ＮＢＥ‐１が復活か？

translation.en: How did that happen? Don't answer.
translation.ja: なぜだ？ 答えるな

translation.en: I don't know what you're hiding, but I don't want anything to do with it.
translation.ja: お前が隠してることに 関わりたくない

translation.en: So, good-bye. You never saw me. I got bagels to schmear. Vanish.
translation.ja: お前が隠してることに 関わりたくない 早く消えろ

translation.en: Can you give me five seconds? Look, hold on, I need your help.
translation.ja: 聞いてくれ　力を借りたい

translation.en: Really? You need my help?
translation.ja: 私の力を借りたいだと？

translation.en: I need... Look, I am slowly losing my mind.
translation.ja: いいか 僕は正気を失い始めてる

translation.en: Okay, I had a little crab-bot, plunged a device deep into the soft tissues of my brain
translation.ja: ロボットに変な装置を 頭に入れられ―

translation.en: and started projecting little alien symbols like a freaking home movie.
translation.ja: エイリアン文字を 投影した

translation.en: And on top of that, I'm a wanted fugitive. So, you think you got it rough?
translation.ja: その上 指名手配までされてる

translation.en: You said it projected images off your brain?
translation.ja: 頭の中の文字を投影した？

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Meat locker, now.
translation.ja: 貯蔵庫へ入れ

translation.en: LEO: Dead pigs. MIKAELA: Yuck.
translation.ja: 豚の死骸だ

translation.en: What you're about to see is top secret.
translation.ja: 極秘事項を見せる

translation.en: Do not tell my mother.
translation.ja: ママには言うな

translation.en: LEO: Swine flu. Not good. SIMMONS: Now you know.
translation.ja: 豚インフルが怖い 山羊肉にも豚肉にも その裏には―

translation.en: Next time you eat a goat or a pig, there's a story behind it.
translation.ja: 山羊肉にも豚肉にも その裏には―

translation.en: Sad little story.
translation.ja: 悲しい物語がある

translation.en: TV: An entire city flat. How do you explain that?
translation.ja: “宇宙人を信じる”と？

translation.en: Are you saying you believe in aliens?
translation.ja: “宇宙人を信じる”と？ マークに関する ファイルはどこだ？

translation.en: SIMMONS: Okay, files, files. We're talking about symbols.
translation.ja: マークに関する ファイルはどこだ？

translation.en: Hey, still radioactive. Hands off.
translation.ja: 触るな　放射能を帯びてる

translation.en: Okay, Cube-brain. Any of these look like the symbols you saw?
translation.ja: キューブ頭　お前が見た マークは どれだ？

translation.en: Where'd you get these?
translation.ja: これは？

translation.en: Before I got fired, I poached S-7's crown jewel,
translation.ja: 解雇前に奪った セクター７の お宝だ

translation.en: over 75 years of alien research, which points to one inescapable fact.
translation.ja: 75年以上の異星人調査が １つの事実を示している

translation.en: The Transformers, they've been here a long, long time.
translation.ja: トランスフォーマーは 大昔から地球にいた

translation.en: How do I know?
translation.ja: 証拠は―

translation.en: Archeologists found these unexplained markings in ancient ruins all over the world.
translation.ja: 世界中で考古学者が 発見した謎のマークだ

translation.en: China. Egypt. Greece.
translation.ja: 中国　エジプト　ギリシャ

translation.en: Shot in 1932. These the symbols you're seeing in your head?
translation.ja: 1932年撮影だ お前が見たマークだろ？

translation.en: Same ones over here, right?
translation.ja: これだな？

translation.en: So, tell me, how did they end up all drawing the same things?
translation.ja: なぜ 同じマークが 描かれていると思う？

translation.en: Aliens. And I think some of them stayed.
translation.ja: エイリアンが描いた 地球に残った奴もいる

translation.en: Check this out. Project Black Knife.
translation.ja: これは “ブラックナイフ計画”

translation.en: Robots in disguise, hiding here all along.
translation.ja: ロボットは姿を変え― 地球に隠れた

translation.en: We detected radioactive signatures all across the country.
translation.ja: 国中で 放射能反応が 確認された

translation.en: I pleaded on my knees with S-7 to investigate it,
translation.ja: セクター７に 調査を懇願したが―

translation.en: but they said the readings were infinitesimal,
translation.ja: 数値が微弱だとして 却下されたよ

translation.en: that I was obsessed.
translation.ja: 私の妄想だと言われた！

translation.en: Me. Can you imagine that?
translation.ja: 信じられるか？

translation.en: there was another Energon source here.
translation.ja: 他にもエネルゴンの源が…

translation.en: -On Earth. Another source? -On Earth.
translation.ja: 地球にあるんだな？

translation.en: Okay? And that these symbols, maps in my head, would lead him there.
translation.ja: 僕の頭の中に地図がある

translation.en: You talk to your Autobot friends about this?
translation.ja: オートボットには？

translation.en: No, no, no, the source is before them. Whatever the Energon source is, it predates them. It's before them.
translation.ja: 話してない 彼らより前から存在してる

translation.en: -So, it comes before them. -Correct.
translation.ja: 大昔から そう

translation.en: Well, then we're porked, unless we can talk to a Decepticon.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンに 質問するか？

translation.en: I mean, I'm not on speaking terms with them.
translation.ja: 知り合いは いないが

translation.en: Actually, I am.
translation.ja: 私には いるわ

translation.en: WHEELIE: Let me out.
translation.ja: 出せ！

translation.en: This is going to be a little bit sad.
translation.ja: こいつよ

translation.en: Open it.
translation.ja: 開けて

translation.en: I will have so many Decepticons on your butt.
translation.ja: 俺の仲間が ここに来るぞ

translation.en: Hey, behave.
translation.ja: 静かに

translation.en: -What is it, a Decepticon? -Yeah.
translation.ja: ディセプティコン？

translation.en: -And you're training him? -I'm trying to.
translation.ja: しつけは？ 試してる

translation.en: I spent my whole adult life combing the planet for aliens,
translation.ja: 私は異星人排除に 苦労したのに―

translation.en: and you're carrying around one in your purse like a little Chihuahua.
translation.ja: チワワのように 持ち歩くとは

translation.en: Do you want a throwdown, you pubic 'fro-head?
translation.ja: やる気か？　モジャ毛野郎

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry about your eye, you know,
translation.ja: 目を焼いて ごめんなさい 協力すれば もう一方は 焼かない

translation.en: but, if you're a good boy, then I'm not gonna torch your other eye.
translation.ja: 協力すれば もう一方は 焼かない

translation.en: Okay? I'm not gonna torch it.
translation.ja: このマークのことを 教えてちょうだい

translation.en: Just tell me what these symbols are, please.
translation.ja: このマークのことを 教えてちょうだい お願い

translation.en: All right. I know that. That's the language of the Primes.
translation.ja: これはプライムたちが 使う言葉だ

translation.en: I don't read it, but these guys...
translation.ja: 俺には読めないけど

translation.en: Where the frick did you find photos of these guys?
translation.ja: なぜ こいつらの写真を？

translation.en: -Is this they? -Yeah. Seekers, pal.
translation.ja: “こいつら”？ “シーカー”だ　数千年前 何かを探しに地球に来た

translation.en: Oldest of the old. They've been here thousands of years,
translation.ja: “シーカー”だ　数千年前 何かを探しに地球に来た

translation.en: looking for something. I don't know what.
translation.ja: “シーカー”だ　数千年前 何かを探しに地球に来た 奴らなら その文字が読める 居場所を知ってるぜ

translation.en: Nobody tells me nothing, but they'll translate those symbols for you. And I know where to find them.
translation.ja: 奴らなら その文字が読める 居場所を知ってるぜ

translation.en: -Show us. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 教えろ ああ　いいとも

translation.en: SIMMONS: The closest one's in Washington.
translation.ja: 近いのはワシントン

translation.en: Smithsonian Air and Space Museum. Land of dreams in there.
translation.ja: スミソニアン航空宇宙博物館 私にとって夢の場所だ

translation.en: All I ever wanted to be was an astronaut.
translation.ja: 宇宙飛行士になりたかった

translation.en: -SIMMONS: Hold those. -What is that?
translation.ja: 持ってろ それは？

translation.en: What? I wear them when I'm in a funk.
translation.ja: 気合入れる時にはく

translation.en: So does Giambi, Jeter. It's a baseball thing. Okay.
translation.ja: 野球選手がつける サポーターだ

translation.en: Watches synchronized, sharp mind and empty bladder. You get caught, demand an attorney and don't ever say my name.
translation.ja: 時計を合わせ 準備万端 逮捕されても私の名は出すな

translation.en: Take one of these pills. Slip it under your tongue. It's the high-concentrate polymer they put in Oreo cookies.
translation.ja: この錠剤を 舌の下に仕込んでおけ

translation.en: Tricks the polygraph every time. Okay. Now, let's get this show on the road.
translation.ja: ウソ発見器にかかっても ごまかせる

translation.en: No, listen, I can't do this.
translation.ja: 俺にはムリだ

translation.en: I'm not some alien bounty hunter, guys.
translation.ja: 異星人狩りなんて

translation.en: I'm not gonna do this. Guards have guns. I don't want to die.
translation.ja: 死にたくない

translation.en: Kid, kid, kid.
translation.ja: おい　坊や

translation.en: You compromise this mission, you are dead to me.
translation.ja: お前のせいで失敗したら 殺すぞ

translation.en: Now look into my eyes and tighten up that sphincter.
translation.ja: 私の目を見て ケツの穴を締めろ

translation.en: GUARD ON PA: The museum is now closing.
translation.ja: 閉館の時間です

translation.en: Yo, baba! Bad news, bro. Ran out of toilet paper. You got any out here? Please tell me you do.
translation.ja: トイレットペーパーがない 補充してよ

translation.en: Sir. I suggest you get in there. The museum is closed.
translation.ja: 出て来ないで もう閉館ですよ

translation.en: Listen, man, I understand that, but as you can see, this is important. All right? Thumper dumper. I got to go. All right.
translation.ja: それは分かってるけど 今 用を足してる途中だ

translation.en: GUARD: Sir, you are a grown, naked man around children.
translation.ja: いい大人が何やってる

translation.en: Pull your pants up and exit the building.
translation.ja: ズボンを上げて退出を

translation.en: You got that paper, right, sir?
translation.ja: 早く紙をくれ

translation.en: GUARD: You should be embarrassed. This is a family museum, sir.
translation.ja: 恥ずかしいと思わないか？

translation.en: What is going on here?
translation.ja: どうなってる？

translation.en: How many times can you get tased in the nuts before you can't have kids?
translation.ja: 何回 タマに電気を通すと 子供ができなくなるかな？

translation.en: You are an amateur, man, a rank amateur.
translation.ja: まったく　ひどい素人だ

translation.en: We just downed five guards. Five guards.
translation.ja: 警備員を５人 倒した

translation.en: -Get your stuff and get out of here. -Give me a second here.
translation.ja: 急がないと

translation.en: I got to get the tracker, all right.
translation.ja: 放射能探知機を

translation.en: Be good.
translation.ja: 静かに

translation.en: WHEELIE: I'm claustrophobic.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Look, look. Follow him. Follow him. He knows where he's going.
translation.ja: 彼を追って 場所を知ってるみたい

translation.en: -He knows something. -What? He knows something.
translation.ja: 彼は何かを知ってる

translation.en: -You got what I got? -Yeah.
translation.ja: これだ ブラックバードだ

translation.en: SIMMONS: Blackbird.
translation.ja: ブラックバードだ

translation.en: There he is.
translation.ja: こいつだ

translation.en: This guy's a legend, like the Chairman of the Board!
translation.ja: 彼は伝説の存在だ シナトラ並みだ

translation.en: Yo, freshman, point the shard and watch the magic happen.
translation.ja: オールスパークのカケラを 彼に向けてみろ

translation.en: Shit. It's a Decepticon!
translation.ja: ディセプティコンよ！

translation.en: -Decepticon? -Decepticon?
translation.ja: 敵か？

translation.en: Behind the MiG now!
translation.ja: ミグの裏に！

translation.en: JETFIRE: What sort of hideous mausoleum is this?
translation.ja: この墓場のごとき場所は？

translation.en: Answer me, pawns and knaves. Show yourselves or suffer my infinite wrath.
translation.ja: 答えよ　無価値な下僕(げぼく)ども 私を怒らせたいのか？

translation.en: You little spinal-cord-based organisms!
translation.ja: ちっぽけな脊椎動物ども いまいましい！

translation.en: Behold the eternal glory of Jetfire.
translation.ja: 見よ　ジェットファイア様の 栄光の姿を！

translation.en: Prepare for remote systems override
translation.ja: 遠隔システム変更

translation.en: I tell you, this guy did not age well.
translation.ja: 厄介なジジイだ

translation.en: I don't think he's gonna hurt us.
translation.ja: 敵じゃない

translation.en: I command these doors to open.
translation.ja: ドアを開くのだ

translation.en: Fire! I said, fire!
translation.ja: 発射！ “発射”と言ったのに！

translation.en: Bollocks.
translation.ja: いまいましい

translation.en: Damn these worthless parts.
translation.ja: 役立たずの部品め

translation.en: Wait a second.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ

translation.en: Itchy, wretched rust in my arse.
translation.ja: 尻が錆びついてる 痒くて いまいましい

translation.en: The museum is going to be very angry. Very angry.
translation.ja: 博物館から こっぴどく怒られるぞ

translation.en: We gotta catch that plane.
translation.ja: あいつを追うんだ

translation.en: Right. I'm on a mission.
translation.ja: 私には任務がある

translation.en: HUMANS: Wait, wait, wait, wait.
translation.ja: だが思い出せん

translation.en: -What do you want? -Look, we just want to talk.
translation.ja: 何だ？ 話がある

translation.en: I have no time to talk. I'm on a mission.
translation.ja: そんな暇はない　私は傭兵だ ここは どこの惑星だ？

translation.en: I'm a mercenary doom-bringer. What planet am I on?
translation.ja: そんな暇はない　私は傭兵だ ここは どこの惑星だ？ 地球

translation.en: -Earth. -Earth?
translation.ja: 地球？

translation.en: Terrible name for a planet. Might as well call it "Dirt."
translation.ja: 変な名だ 薄汚いから “泥の惑星”がふさわしい

translation.en: Planet "Dirt."
translation.ja: 薄汚いから “泥の惑星”がふさわしい

translation.en: Tell me, is that robot civil war still going on?
translation.ja: “ロボット戦争”は― 続いてるか？ どちらが優勢だ？

translation.en: -Who's winning? -The Decepticons.
translation.ja: ディセプティコン

translation.en: Well, I changed sides to the Autobots.
translation.ja: 私は彼らを見限った “見限った”とは？

translation.en: What do you mean, changed sides?
translation.ja: “見限った”とは？

translation.en: JETFIRE: It's a choice. It's an intensely personal decision.
translation.ja: どちらの側につくかは 個人の選択だ

translation.en: So much negativity. Who wants to live a life filled with hate?
translation.ja: 敵を憎むばかりで イヤになった

translation.en: You mean you don't have to work for those miserable, freaking Decepticons?
translation.ja: ディセプティコンの 仲間をやめたの？

translation.en: If Decepticons had their way, they'd destroy the whole universe.
translation.ja: 彼らが勝つと宇宙は滅びる

translation.en: I'm changing sides. I'm changing sides, too, warrior goddess.
translation.ja: 俺も こっちの味方になる

translation.en: -Who's your little Autobot? -You're cute.
translation.ja: 手下にして かわいい

translation.en: Name's Wheelie. Yeah. Say my name, say my name.
translation.ja: 俺はホィーリー 名前を呼んでくれ

translation.en: What are you allowing to happen to your foot just now?
translation.ja: 脚に触ってる

translation.en: At least he's faithful, Sam.
translation.ja: でも忠実よ

translation.en: Yeah, well, he's faithful and he's nude and he's perverted.
translation.ja: 忠実だろうけど変態だ

translation.en: Can you just... Can you stop?
translation.ja: おい　やめないか

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing? -It's just something
translation.ja: 大事な話がある

translation.en: to think about. I won't argue with... What were you saying?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: I told you my name was Jetfire, so stop judging me.
translation.ja: 私はジェットファイアだ 文句あるのか？

translation.en: Somebody shit the bed this morning.
translation.ja: 寝起きが悪いな

translation.en: JETFIRE: I have issues of my own. And it started with my mother.
translation.ja: 元は 私の母親が いけないんだ

translation.en: My ancestors have been here for centuries.
translation.ja: 先祖は何世紀も ここにいた

translation.en: My father, he was a wheel, the first wheel.
translation.ja: 父は 宇宙初の車輪だった 何に変身したと思う？

translation.en: Do you know what he transformed into?
translation.ja: 父は 宇宙初の車輪だった 何に変身したと思う？ さあ

translation.en: -No. -Nothing. But he did so with honor, dignity, damn it.
translation.ja: 何にも変身しなかった だが それを誇っていた

translation.en: (MUTTERING) My boosters are fried.
translation.ja: ブースターの故障だ

translation.en: I think we can help each other.
translation.ja: 助け合おう

translation.en: You know things I don't know. I know things you don't know, I do.
translation.ja: お互いの知識を交換するんだ

translation.en: I don't think he knows anything. Honestly, I don't.
translation.ja: こいつ 知識がなさそうだ

translation.en: I could do this all day. It comes in waves, these vivid symbols. They're symbols, but they're in my mind.
translation.ja: 僕の頭の中に マークが はっきり見える

translation.en: You see, all this is in my mind and Megatron wants what's in my mind.
translation.ja: メガトロンと ザ･フォールンが―

translation.en: Him and someone called the Fallen.
translation.ja: それを欲しがってる

translation.en: The Fallen? I know him.
translation.ja: ザ･フォールン？

translation.en: He left me here to rust. The original Decepticon.
translation.ja: 奴が私を ここに置き去りにした

translation.en: He's terrible to work for. It's always apocalypse, chaos, crisis.
translation.ja: 奴が行くところには 必ず混乱と破滅がある

translation.en: These transcriptions, they were part of my mission, the Fallen's search.
translation.ja: この文は ザ･フォールンから 私への命令だ

translation.en: I remember now, for the Dagger's Tip, and the key.
translation.ja: この文は ザ･フォールンから 私への命令だ “ダガーの剣先”と“鍵”だ

translation.en: Slow down. The Dagger's Tip? The key? What are you talking about?
translation.ja: それは何？　説明してよ その暇はない

translation.en: No time to explain. Hold on, everybody. Stay still or you'll die.
translation.ja: 動くな じっとしてないと死ぬぞ！

translation.en: Well, that wasn't so bad. I just hope we're still on the right planet.
translation.ja: 上出来だった 同じ星だといいがな

translation.en: WHEELIE: Hey, that freaking hurt.
translation.ja: スゲえ痛かったぞ！

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.ja: 何てことだ

translation.en: Oh, my God, what a beautiful face. This would be a perfect moment, except you landed on my testicles.
translation.ja: 目の前に美人がいる 幸せだけど タマが潰れそう

translation.en: Please, get off.
translation.ja: 頼むから どいて

translation.en: (GRUNTS) God, my balls.
translation.ja: タマが…

translation.en: MIKAELA: Sam!
translation.ja: サム！

translation.en: Where are we? Simmons!
translation.ja: ここは？ シモンズ！

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God. What is this? It's Vegas.
translation.ja: どうなってる？ 何なんだ？ ここは？　ベガスか？

translation.en: -SAM: You guys okay? -MIKAELA: Yeah.
translation.ja: 無事か？

translation.en: LEO: Hey, I think we're in Vegas.
translation.ja: ここはラスベガスだ

translation.en: That really, really hurt. You're just lucky that I didn't get hurt!
translation.ja: 痛かったぞ 私が無事でラッキーだな

translation.en: People could have gotten killed, okay? And if I would have gotten hurt,
translation.ja: もし私がケガしたら ママが黙っては…

translation.en: -you would have heard... -Shut up. I told you I was opening a space bridge.
translation.ja: “空間の橋(スペースブリッジ)”を開く と言ったろ

translation.en: It's the fastest way to travel to Egypt.
translation.ja: エジプトへの近道だ

translation.en: When did you... When did you tell us? You didn't tell us anything.
translation.ja: そんなこと 言わなかった

translation.en: You didn't tell us anything. Why are we in Egypt?
translation.ja: なぜ エジプトに来た？

translation.en: Don't you get snippy with me, fleshling. You were duly informed.
translation.ja: やかましい 情報は ちゃんと与えたぞ

translation.en: Can you just stop for a second? Can you focus? Can you tell us why we're in Egypt so we can all have a little bit of semblance of peace of mind?
translation.ja: なぜエジプトなのか教えてよ そうすれば落ち着ける

translation.en: JETFIRE: This planet was visited by our race once before,
translation.ja: 私の先祖は 昔 この星を訪れた

translation.en: by our earliest ancestors, millennia ago.
translation.ja: 何千年も前のことだ

translation.en: They were on an exploratory mission to harvest Energon,
translation.ja: 彼らは“エネルゴン”を 探していた

translation.en: the lifeblood of our race.
translation.ja: 我が種族のパワーの源だ

translation.en: Without it, we'll all perish, oxidize and rust, like my wretched self.
translation.ja: それがないと我々は 錆びつき 滅んでしまう

translation.en: Do you have any idea what it's like to slowly fall apart and die?
translation.ja: 分解して死んでゆく気持ちが 分かるか？

translation.en: Let's not get episodic, okay, old-timer?
translation.ja: 断片的な話じゃ 分からない

translation.en: Beginning, middle, end. Facts. Details. Condense. Plot. Tell it.
translation.ja: 最初から順を追って話せ 詳細 かつ 簡潔にだ

translation.en: Somewhere buried in this desert,
translation.ja: この砂漠のどこかに― 私の先祖が ある装置を作った

translation.en: our ancestors built a great machine.
translation.ja: 私の先祖が ある装置を作った

translation.en: It harvests Energon by destroying suns.
translation.ja: 太陽を爆発させ エネルゴンを集める装置を

translation.en: -Destroy suns? -You mean blow them up?
translation.ja: 太陽を？ 爆発？

translation.en: Yes. You see, in the beginning, there were seven Primes, our original leaders.
translation.ja: かつて７体のプライムがいた 初代のリーダーたちだ

translation.en: And they set out into the universe, seeking distant suns to harvest.
translation.ja: 彼らは収穫のため 太陽に向かった

translation.en: The Primes set out with one rule,
translation.ja: 彼らのルールは１つ

translation.en: never destroy a planet with life,
translation.ja: “生命体が存在する星は 破壊しない”

translation.en: until one of them tried to defy this rule.
translation.ja: だがルールを破った者がいた そして奴は こう呼ばれた

translation.en: And his name forevermore was the Fallen.
translation.ja: だがルールを破った者がいた そして奴は こう呼ばれた “ザ･フォールン”

translation.en: He despised the human race
translation.ja: 奴は人類を見下し―

translation.en: and he wanted to kill you all by turning on that machine.
translation.ja: 装置を使って 人類を滅ぼそうとした

translation.en: The only way to activate it is with a legendary key
translation.ja: その装置の起動には “鍵”が必要になる

translation.en: called the Matrix of Leadership.
translation.ja: “リーダーの マトリックス”だ

translation.en: A great battle took place over possession of the Matrix.
translation.ja: マトリックスをめぐり 激しい戦いが始まった

translation.en: The Fallen was stronger than his brothers,
translation.ja: ザ･フォールンは 兄弟より強かったため―

translation.en: so they had no choice but to steal and hide it from him.
translation.ja: プライムたちは 鍵を隠すしかなかった

translation.en: In the ultimate sacrifice, they gave their lives to seal the Matrix away
translation.ja: 彼らは命を犠牲にして マトリックスを封印した

translation.en: in a tomb made of their very own bodies,
translation.ja: 自分たちの体で作った 墓の中に

translation.en: a tomb we cannot find.
translation.ja: その墓のありかは 誰も知らない

translation.en: Somewhere, buried in this desert, that deadly machine remains.
translation.ja: この砂漠のどこかに 眠っている装置のありかを―

translation.en: The Fallen knows where it is
translation.ja: ザ･フォールンは知ってる

translation.en: and if he finds the tomb of the Primes,
translation.ja: プライムの墓が見つかれば―

translation.en: your world will be no more.
translation.ja: お前たちの世界は破滅する

translation.en: Okay, so how do we stop him?
translation.ja: 止める方法は？

translation.en: Only a Prime can defeat the Fallen.
translation.ja: プライムだけが倒せる

translation.en: Optimus Prime?
translation.ja: オプティマス？

translation.en: So, you've met a Prime?
translation.ja: プライムに会ったのか？

translation.en: Why, you must have met a great descendant.
translation.ja: いや　プライムの 子孫だろうな

translation.en: Is he alive, here on this planet?
translation.ja: 彼は生きて地球にいるのか？

translation.en: He sacrificed himself to save me.
translation.ja: 僕を救うため 犠牲に

translation.en: So, he's dead.
translation.ja: 死んだのか

translation.en: Without a Prime, it's impossible. No one else could stop the Fallen.
translation.ja: プライムがいなければ なすすべはない

translation.en: So, the same energy that's gonna be used to reactivate the machine
translation.ja: 装置の鍵が持つ エネルギーで―

translation.en: could that energy somehow be used to reactivate Optimus and bring him back to life?
translation.ja: オプティマスが 生き返らないかな？

translation.en: It was never designed for that purpose, but it's an energy like no other.
translation.ja: そういう使い方はないが 鍵が生み出すパワーは偉大だ

translation.en: So, then how do you get us to the Matrix
translation.ja: どうやって― “マトリックス”を 見つける？

translation.en: before the Decepticons get to me?
translation.ja: “マトリックス”を 見つける？

translation.en: Follow your mind, your map, your symbols.
translation.ja: お前の頭の中の 地図をたどる

translation.en: What you carved in the sand, it's your clue.
translation.ja: 砂に書いた言葉がヒントだ

translation.en: When dawn alights the Dagger's Tip,
translation.ja: “暁がダガーの剣先を 照らす時―”

translation.en: Three Kings will reveal the doorway.
translation.ja: “３人の王が扉を示す”

translation.en: Find the doorway. Go now! Go!
translation.ja: その扉を探すのだ さあ　行け

translation.en: That was my mission. It's your mission now.
translation.ja: 私の任務を引き継ぎ―

translation.en: Go before the Decepticons find me and find you.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンたちが 気づく前に行くのだ

translation.en: Okay, here's what my CIA contact says.
translation.ja: ＣＩＡの情報では アカバ湾は―

translation.en: Ancient Sumerians used to call the Gulf of Aqaba the "Dagger's Tip."
translation.ja: 古代シュメール語で “ダガーの剣先” そこだ

translation.en: -That's the Dagger's Tip. -It's part of the Red Sea. It divides Egypt and Jordan like the tip of a blade.
translation.ja: 紅海が剣先のように 陸を分けてる

translation.en: 29.5 degrees north, 35 east. Here it is.
translation.ja: 北緯29･5度　東経35度だ これだ

translation.en: First thing we've got to do is get Optimus to the Dagger's Tip.
translation.ja: オプティマスを運ぶ

translation.en: How are you gonna get him halfway around the world?
translation.ja: 地球の裏側から？

translation.en: I'm gonna make a call.
translation.ja: 電話しよう

translation.en: We got cops.
translation.ja: 警官だ

translation.en: I can't go to prison, guys.
translation.ja: 刑務所はイヤだ！

translation.en: SIMMONS: Sam, we got to get off this road and lay low.
translation.ja: この道を外れて 隠れろ

translation.en: Man, stupid cops.
translation.ja: バカな警官だ

translation.en: This is what's called blending in like a ninja.
translation.ja: まるで忍者だな

translation.en: Shut up or I'll blend my fist in your face.
translation.ja: 黙ってろ　顔を殴るぞ

translation.en: They're gone.
translation.ja: 行ったわ

translation.en: Okay, we're running out of time.
translation.ja: 急ごう　レノックスに電話を

translation.en: I gotta make the call to Lennox...
translation.ja: 急ごう　レノックスに電話を ダメだ

translation.en: You're on the Worldwide Wanted List.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: Try calling one base, they'll track you here in seconds. CIA is all over this place!
translation.ja: お前は手配されてる きっと逆探知されるぞ

translation.en: You're gonna call.
translation.ja: 電話して

translation.en: Okay. That's a good idea.
translation.ja: よし 名案だ

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: 早く

translation.en: I mean, I just had my mind on other things, like winding up in an Egyptian prison.
translation.ja: “エジプトの 刑務所行きか？”と考えてた

translation.en: MAN ON PA: NEST departure, 2100 hours.
translation.ja: ネストの出発は21時

translation.en: So, we're shipping him back to base. This is such a mistake.
translation.ja: 基地へ運ぶのか 大きな間違いだ

translation.en: SOLDIER: Major Lennox, phone call.
translation.ja: レノックス少佐 電話です

translation.en: Lennox, I'm with the kid. The kid. You
translation.ja: 今 例の若者と一緒だ

translation.en: know, the one with the attitude, right? We need the truck. The truck.
translation.ja: 例の“トラック”を 運んでくれ

translation.en: We got a possible resurrection going on over here. You're not gonna believe where we are.
translation.ja: ここに運べば 復活させられるかも

translation.en: Code Tut, as in King Tutankhamen. Back of a $1 bill.
translation.ja: 場所は“ツタンカーメン” １ドル札の裏だ

translation.en: Coordinates for airdrop, 29.5 north,
translation.ja: 次の座標に投下しろ 北緯29･5　東経34･88

translation.en: 34.88 east. Write it down. Write it.
translation.ja: 次の座標に投下しろ 北緯29･5　東経34･88 書いたか？

translation.en: Oh, my God. I got to go. Okay. Heat comes.
translation.ja: まずいぞ もう切るぞ

translation.en: Wait, who are you?
translation.ja: 誰だ？

translation.en: Wait. It's me. Leo. Me. Leo. Leo. Leo.
translation.ja: 俺だよ レオだ 警察から逃げよう

translation.en: Cops are coming right now. We need to go.
translation.ja: レオだ 警察から逃げよう

translation.en: Move, move, move, move.
translation.ja: 行け　行け

translation.en: Coordinates, 29.5 north, 34.88 east.

translation.en: -Egypt? -Are you serious?

translation.en: Sir.
translation.ja: 補佐官

translation.en: Even if we could figure out a way to get big man over there, how is this little kid supposed to bring him back to life?

translation.en: Look, I don't know, but we got to trust him.
translation.ja: 知らないが 彼を信じるしかない

translation.en: SAM: Okay, let's go over it again.
translation.ja: 復習だ

translation.en: BOTH: When the dawn alights the Dagger's Tip,
translation.ja: “ダガーの剣先を 照らす時―”

translation.en: -the Three Kings...- Will reveal the doorway.
translation.ja: “３人の王が…” “扉を示す”

translation.en: That's what he said. You know what it means?

translation.en: -No, what does it mean? -SIMMONS: I have no idea.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: LEO: Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Checkpoint. Checkpoint. I don't have my passport.

translation.en: GUARD: Passport!

translation.en: All right, chill. This is espionage now. I can handle it.

translation.en: These are my people. I'm one-thirty-sixth Arab.
translation.ja: 任せろ 私は36分の１ アラブ人だ

translation.en: WHEELIE: Great, a fricking Munchkin. Little people are mean. Tell him he's tall.
translation.ja: あいつ意地が悪そうだ お世辞でおだてろ

translation.en: The Dagger's Tip? Right?

translation.en: Egypt, Jordan. We want to go there.

translation.en: Me and my family. This is my family. This is my son,
translation.ja: これは私の家族 彼は息子だ

translation.en: my other son, my daughter. We're tourists, from New York.
translation.ja: もう１人の息子に娘 ＮＹからの観光客だ

translation.en: -New York? -Yes. Yes.
translation.ja: ＮＹ？ そうだ

translation.en: Fifty kilometers.
translation.ja: 50キロ先だ

translation.en: You look like the guy that runs my falafel stand. Thank you very much.
translation.ja: あんた 知り合いに似てる

translation.en: I- know. I know you from somewhere. -Go, Yankees!
translation.ja: 他人とは思えないよ

translation.en: Put it on the wire to the CIA.

translation.en: STARSCREAM IN PURSUIT
translation.ja: 〈スタースクリーム追跡中〉

translation.en: (SHUSHING) SKIDS: Undercover, yo. You got to blend in with your surroundings.
translation.ja: バレないように 周囲に溶け込め

translation.en: You know, you got to be part of the landscape.
translation.ja: 風景の一部になるんだよ

translation.en: Awesome! I think aliens built that.

translation.en: Come on. Move it! Move it!
translation.ja: 早くするんだ！

translation.en: Guard us. Low profile. Don't make a scene, okay?

translation.en: NEST TEAM E.T.A. - 6 HRS
translation.ja: ネスト部隊 到着予定‐６時間後

translation.en: SAM: Being my girlfriend is hazardous to your health.
translation.ja: 僕と付き合うと体に悪い

translation.en: Yeah, well, girls like dangerous boys.
translation.ja: そうね 女は危険な男が好き ホント？

translation.en: -Do they? -Yeah.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: You might as well just say it.
translation.ja: あの言葉を言って

translation.en: Ladies first.
translation.ja: レディーファーストだ

translation.en: Okay, so tonight you're going to be a gentleman. You're really chivalrous.
translation.ja: 今夜は紳士なのね あなたは本物の騎士よ

translation.en: Why are you mad at me?
translation.ja: 怒ってんの？

translation.en: You know what? Baby, I'm not... I'm not mad.
translation.ja: 私は別に 怒ってなんかいないけど―

translation.en: Do you realize that I just flew 3,000 miles to keep you from getting killed?
translation.ja: あなたを守るため 飛行機で飛んで来たのよ

translation.en: I know.
translation.ja: 分かってる

translation.en: Who else could be your girlfriend, Sam?
translation.ja: 私以外の女性が―

translation.en: Look at the things I go through with you.
translation.ja: こんなことに耐えられる？

translation.en: And now we're underneath the moon and the stars and the three most beautiful pyramids on the planet
translation.ja: 輝く月の下で 美しいピラミッドに囲まれ―

translation.en: and you still can't even tell me that you love me.
translation.ja: “愛してる”と言えないの？

translation.en: Pyramids.
translation.ja: “ピラミッド”

translation.en: -What? -Why do boys always change the subject?
translation.ja: 何よ？　話題を変えるの？

translation.en: Pyramids and stars.
translation.ja: ピラミッドと星…

translation.en: -Sam? -Come with me really quick.
translation.ja: 来てくれ

translation.en: Simmons. Leo. Wake up.

translation.en: Listen, astronomy class, page 47. Remember the class?
translation.ja: 天文学のテキスト 47ページ

translation.en: No. I was only in college for two days. Remember that?

translation.en: -Here. Get up. Up, up. -What is he talking about?

translation.en: Okay, you see those three stars? You see how the last one touches the horizon?

translation.en: That's Orion's belt, but it's also called the Three Kings.
translation.ja: 地平線に接してる３つの星は オリオン座のベルトだ ３人の王がピラミッドを その星と 同じ配置で建てた

translation.en: And the reason for that is the three Egyptian kings who built the pyramids of Giza built them to mirror those stars,
translation.ja: ３人の王がピラミッドを その星と 同じ配置で建てた

translation.en: so it's like an arrow staring us straight in the face.
translation.ja: それが指すのは…

translation.en: They all point due east, towards Jordan. The mountains of Petra.
translation.ja: 東の方向 ヨルダンのぺトラの山だ

translation.en: PILOT ON PA: We've had an engine malfunction. We're gonna have to divert to SOCCENT.

translation.en: Flight master, let's lighten the load and prepare for bailout.
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: Bailout? Bailout? Bailout? Bailout?
translation.ja: “脱出”って どうする？

translation.en: All right, team, grab your chutes!
translation.ja: 全員 パラシュートを持て

translation.en: You familiar with the standard MC-4?
translation.ja: 手順は知ってます？

translation.en: Of course not.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: I've never jumped out of a perfectly good airplane before
translation.ja: 飛び降りたことなどない

translation.en: -Wait, this really happening? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 本当に飛ぶのか？

translation.en: All right, here we go.
translation.ja: 行きますよ

translation.en: Wait a minute. Wait a minute. You're behind this, aren't you?

translation.en: What are you talking about? You heard the pilot.
translation.ja: パイロットの命令ですよ 緊急事態です

translation.en: These guys don't mess around. This is just standard procedure.
translation.ja: パイロットの命令ですよ 緊急事態です あなたも私に言ったはずです “命令には従え”と

translation.en: I'm just following orders to the letter. Isn't that what you said?
translation.ja: あなたも私に言ったはずです “命令には従え”と

translation.en: You just signed a death warrant on your career, Major.
translation.ja: 君のキャリアは終わりだな

translation.en: What was that? What was that?
translation.ja: 待て　これは何だ？

translation.en: That's not good. Come on.
translation.ja: まずいな

translation.en: -Right this way. -I can't jump out of an airplane.

translation.en: I have an ulcer. No, no.
translation.ja: 私にはムリだ　胃潰瘍なんだ

translation.en: Come on. It's okay. I really can't do this. What are you doing...

translation.en: Come here! Come here.
translation.ja: こっちへ さあ

translation.en: Why aren't you wearing your chute?

translation.en: Because I have to secure the VIPs first.
translation.ja: ＶＩＰの身の安全が優先です

translation.en: Okay, I want you to listen very carefully and memorize everything that I say.

translation.en: Each chute has a GPS tracker so you can be found by Search and Rescue.
translation.ja: 着陸後は救助隊が来ます

translation.en: Right next to that's a fabric webbing called a bridle, which holds the pin that keeps the main container closed.
translation.ja: そのピンが抜けると メイン･パラシュートが開く

translation.en: Okay, are you listening?

translation.en: -I can't hear what... -Stop that.
translation.ja: 聞こえない 聞いて下さい

translation.en: All right. All right.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: When the pilot chute inflates into the air, it pulls the pin and opens the main.
translation.ja: 補助シュートが開いたら ピンが外れる

translation.en: Red's your backup, blue's your primary.
translation.ja: 赤は予備　引くのは青

translation.en: I want you to pull the blue. I need you to pull it really hard.

translation.en: Not now, we're on the plane, you dumb-ass.

translation.en: He say good-bye?
translation.ja: “さよなら”は？

translation.en: No, he didn't even say good-bye.

translation.en: General, we're loaded and ready.

translation.en: You give us the go, and we'll be ready to press in five minutes.

translation.en: -Excellent. -Sir, you need to see this now.

translation.en: -Have we checked these coordinates? -Egypt, sir.

translation.en: -They're airdropping in. -You've got to be kidding me.

translation.en: He knows something. We need to be ready to back him up if this thing goes hot.

translation.en: Copy that.

translation.en: CIA just got a hit on the boy,
translation.ja: 例の若者の居場所が判明

translation.en: 100 miles from the location on that little note there.
translation.ja: あの座標から160キロ

translation.en: It's getting hotter.

translation.en: It's gotta be around here somewhere.
translation.ja: きっと この近くにあるはずだ

translation.en: SIMMONS: You see the size of this?

translation.en: You see this? SKIDS: Spectacular.
translation.ja: こいつは たまげたな

translation.en: Amazing. Look at that.

translation.en: SAM: It's here somewhere, guys.

translation.en: Yeah, why?

translation.en: 'Cause we're trusting Grandpa Blackbird who doesn't even know what planet he's on?

translation.en: In his defense, this is the biggest doorway I've ever seen in my entire life.

translation.en: Okay. Well, that's great. Let me do a quick search, all right?

translation.en: Nope. Ever cross your mind, guys,

translation.en: that archeologists have been here before? There's nothing here.
translation.ja: 考古学者が とっくに調べてるはずだ

translation.en: SIMMONS: Real life is heartbreak, despair, kid.

translation.en: Sometimes you get to the end of the rainbow and the leprechauns went and booby-trapped it!

translation.en: LEO: I'm listening to you? You live with your mother!

translation.en: It's not over.

translation.en: Why are we still listening to you, little punk-ass? I mean, what you ever done for us except ding my rim?

translation.en: Killed Megatron. How about that?

translation.en: Well, he didn't get the job done,

translation.en: you know what I mean, 'cause he's back now...

translation.en: Are you scared? Scared? Scared of your ugly face.

translation.en: I'm ugly? Well, we're twins, you stupid genius.

translation.en: Bring it, then. Get off me.

translation.en: I'll change your face around.

translation.en: I'll get all up in that ass!

translation.en: SAM: Guys! Whoa! Hey!

translation.en: -You like the way that feels? -That didn't hurt.

translation.en: You like that, don't you?
translation.ja: 降参だろ？

translation.en: Come on, Bumblebee! Bumblebee, listen.

translation.en: Now, that's rude.

translation.en: SAM: Oh, my God. The symbols.
translation.ja: 僕の頭の中のマークだ

translation.en: Bee! Shoot it.

translation.en: SIMMONS: Check this out.
translation.ja: 美しいな

translation.en: SAM: These are the bodies Jetfire was talking about.
translation.ja: これがプライムの遺骸だ

translation.en: SIMMONS: The tomb of the Primes.
translation.ja: プライムの墓だ

translation.en: The Matrix.
translation.ja: マトリックスだ

translation.en: SAM: No.
translation.ja: そんな…

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: まさか…

translation.en: SIMMONS: Thousands of years, turned to dust.
translation.ja: 何千年も経て 風化し 塵と化した

translation.en: This isn't how it's supposed to end.
translation.ja: こんなはずじゃ…

translation.en: Hear that?
translation.ja: 聞いたか？

translation.en: US Air Force! C-17s!
translation.ja: アメリカ空軍だ　Ｃ‐17だ！

translation.en: SAM: What's a C-17?
translation.ja: Ｃ‐17って？

translation.en: You can't bring him back, Sam. There's nothing left.
translation.ja: 生き返らせるのはムリよ

translation.en: Look! Look around you.

translation.en: We didn't just go through everything we went through for no reason at all, to just have it end like this.

translation.en: There is a reason that we are here. The voices and the symbols in my head led us here for a purpose.

translation.en: Everyone's after me because of what I know,
translation.ja: 敵は 僕の知識を狙ってる

translation.en: and what I know is that this is going to work.
translation.ja: 僕には分かる うまくいくって

translation.en: How do you know it's gonna work?
translation.ja: なぜ 分かるの？

translation.en: Because I believe it.
translation.ja: 信じてるから

translation.en: You best let me out of this plane.
translation.ja: 俺を ここから降ろしてくれ

translation.en: Dropping the big boy. Sam!
translation.ja: 投下されたぞ サム！

translation.en: You think you can bring him back to life with that pixie dust?

translation.en: Absolutely. Let's go.
translation.ja: もちろんだ　行こう

translation.en: Go!
translation.ja: 行け！

translation.en: Let's move it. Remember, they're friendlies.
translation.ja: 行くんだ！ 周囲をかためろ！

translation.en: Cover Optimus!
translation.ja: オプティマスを隠せ

translation.en: Secure the village. Get those cases down here.
translation.ja: ここに武器を運べ

translation.en: I need snipers and Stingers up high.

translation.en: So, we just dropped off 10 tons of dead robot in the middle of nowhere.
translation.ja: 10トンのロボットを 砂漠に落としたが―

translation.en: I hope this little kid know what he's doing.
translation.ja: うまくいくかな？

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
translation.ja: いくといいが

translation.en: Got a visual! Yellow team! Four clicks!
translation.ja: 見えたぞ イエローチーム　４キロ先だ

translation.en: Pop flare!
translation.ja: 照明弾を撃て！

translation.en: That's them, right there. See the flare?
translation.ja: 照明弾が上がった

translation.en: Right over there! See it?
translation.ja: あそこだ！

translation.en: FOUND THE BOY
translation.ja: 〈小僧を発見〉

translation.en: Sam!
translation.ja: サム！

translation.en: Oh, God. Please, God! Please.
translation.ja: 神様　助けて

translation.en: Leo, stop freaking out. Stop freaking out.
translation.ja: レオ　やめて

translation.en: Shut this guy up, huh?
translation.ja: こいつを黙らせろ

translation.en: Please, just let me live, just let me live!
translation.ja: 死にたくないよ！

translation.en: Just stop screaming... All right, that's it!
translation.ja: もう限界だ！

translation.en: I can't take that guy anymore.
translation.ja: 我慢できない

translation.en: SIMMONS: Hide in the dust. Use the dust.
translation.ja: 砂煙の中に隠れろ

translation.en: We've got to split up. Bumblebee, you're the decoy. You lead the Decepticons away, all right?
translation.ja: バンブルビーはおとりになれ 僕はオプティマスを

translation.en: -I'm gonna get Optimus. -I'll help draw their fire
translation.ja: バンブルビーはおとりになれ 僕はオプティマスを 私とツインズは 敵の攻撃を引きつける

translation.en: -with Huey and Dewey there. -You get to those soldiers.
translation.ja: 私とツインズは 敵の攻撃を引きつける

translation.en: I hope that dust works, kid.
translation.ja: 成功を祈るぞ

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: LEO: He's turning around. He's coming back. He's coming back.
translation.ja: あいつがこっちに 戻って来るぞ

translation.en: It's up to me.
translation.ja: 任せろ

translation.en: One man, alone, betrayed by the country he loves, now its last hope in their final hour of need.
translation.ja: 祖国に裏切られた男が その国の最後の希望となる

translation.en: Prepare to be driven like never before, by the maestro.
translation.ja: マエストロが運転するぞ 気合入れろ

translation.en: Hey, hey. Don't go nowhere. Drive.
translation.ja: 置いてくな　乗せてくれ

translation.en: You'll never make it, kid. I'm coming with you.
translation.ja: この先は 勇気だけではムリだ

translation.en: Bravery will only get you so far. You tased me, okay? You owe me. I'm going.
translation.ja: 俺を感電させたろ 乗せてくれ

translation.en: Okay, okay. That was a test. You passed. All right?
translation.ja: お前を試したんだ

translation.en: That thing's got alien tattoos all over it. That ain't Air Force.
translation.ja: あれは空軍じゃない エイリアンだ

translation.en: What the hell was that?
translation.ja: 今のは何だ？

translation.en: -Anyone copy? -Anyone there? Who's up?
translation.ja: 応答せよ 誰か いないか？

translation.en: -Copy? -SOLDIER: Radio's down.
translation.ja: 通信不能

translation.en: It's dead. Comms are down.
translation.ja: 無線が通じない

translation.en: EMP burst. I see how this day is going in this godforsaken desert.
translation.ja: 電磁波のせいでイカれた 砂漠の真ん中でヤバいぞ

translation.en: Yes, sir?
translation.ja: 何です？ “コードを引け”と言われた

translation.en: GALLOWAY: Major Lennox told me to pull the cord.
translation.ja: “コードを引け”と言われた 知ってます

translation.en: I know, sir. Well, what country am I in right now?
translation.ja: 今 私がいるのは どの国だ？

translation.en: United States.
translation.ja: アメリカ そんなはずはない 私がアメリカから来たんだ

translation.en: No, not the United States. I'm from the United States.
translation.ja: そんなはずはない 私がアメリカから来たんだ

translation.en: I'm in the middle of nowhere surrounded by donkeys.
translation.ja: 周りはロバだらけ…

translation.en: Well, that was our good friend, Galloway. He's less than pleased.
translation.ja: ギャロウェイ氏だ ご機嫌ななめのようだった

translation.en: How is it that we can't reach our men,
translation.ja: 部下と通信不能なのに―

translation.en: but he can reach me, from some random Egyptian desert?
translation.ja: なぜ 彼の電話は つながった？ エジプトの砂漠の ど真ん中から

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.ja: 応答なし

translation.en: Right, go burn an SOS. Let the eye in the sky know we need some help.
translation.ja: 煙で“ＳＯＳ”の合図を出せ

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.ja: 分かりました

translation.en: LENNOX: Pop some more flares so the kid can find us.
translation.ja: 目印に もっと照明弾を

translation.en: Sammy!
translation.ja: サム！

translation.en: MEDIC 1: Clear. MEDIC 2: Ready to shock.
translation.ja: チャージ クリア

translation.en: Clear! MEDIC 2: Ready to shock. One, two, three.
translation.ja: 電気ショックを与える

translation.en: Do it again!
translation.ja: もう一度！

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: サム！

translation.en: Okay, listen to my voice. I love you and I need you.
translation.ja: 私の声を聞いて あなたを愛してる あなたが必要なの だからお願い

translation.en: Please. Please, come back to me. Sam, please! I love you.
translation.ja: 息を吹き返して あなたを愛してる

translation.en: SAM: Where am I? Where am I? Am I dead? Am I dead?
translation.ja: どこだ？ 僕は死んだのか？

translation.en: PRIME: We have been watching you a long, long time.
translation.ja: 我々は君のことを 長い間 見てきた

translation.en: You have fought for Optimus, our last descendant,
translation.ja: 我々の最後の子孫のため 君は戦った

translation.en: with courage and with sacrifice, the virtues of a leader,
translation.ja: 勇気を持ち 自分を犠牲にした それでこそリーダーだ

translation.en: a leader worthy of our secret.
translation.ja: 我々の秘密を教えるに値(あたい)する

translation.en: The Matrix of Leadership is not found, it is earned.
translation.ja: “リーダーのマトリックス” は 勇気ある者が勝ち取る

translation.en: Return now to Optimus. Merge the Matrix with his spark.
translation.ja: オプティマスの元に戻り 彼にマトリックスを与えよ

translation.en: It is, and always has been, your destiny.
translation.ja: それが昔から定められていた 君の運命なのだ

translation.en: Sam!
translation.ja: サム！

translation.en: I love you. I love you.
translation.ja: 愛してる　愛してるよ

translation.en: Boy, you returned for me.
translation.ja: 私のために 戻って来てくれたんだな

translation.en: A living Prime.
translation.ja: プライムが生きてる

translation.en: I don't believe it!
translation.ja: 信じられない！

translation.en: My Matrix!
translation.ja: 私のマトリックスだ

translation.en: Get up! Get up! Get up! Get up!
translation.ja: 早く起きてくれ！

translation.en: JETFIRE: Get up, Prime!
translation.ja: 立て　プライム！

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: ダメだ　弱ってる

translation.en: SAM: He's turning on the machine!
translation.ja: 装置が起動する！

translation.en: You got to stop him! Get up!
translation.ja: 奴を止めてくれ！

translation.en: Optimus!
translation.ja: オプティマス！

translation.en: MEGATRON: Fallen, my master.
translation.ja: ザ･フォールン　我が師よ

translation.en: My brothers could not stop me from this.
translation.ja: かつて兄弟も 私を止められなかった

translation.en: Yes, now I claim your sun.
translation.ja: そうです 人類よ お前らの太陽をもらう

translation.en: Move!
translation.ja: 行け！

translation.en: Enemy target, top of pyramid. Engage!
translation.ja: 敵はピラミッドの上だ

translation.en: Engage! Engage!
translation.ja: 攻撃しろ！

translation.en: In moments, we'll be at firing strength.
translation.ja: じきに発射準備が整う

translation.en: All my Decepticon life, I never did a thing worth doing until now.
translation.ja: 私は これまで― 価値ある行いを してこなかった

translation.en: Optimus, take my parts
translation.ja: 私の体の部品を使え

translation.en: and you will have a power you've never known.
translation.ja: これまでにない力が出せる

translation.en: Fulfill your destiny.
translation.ja: 運命を まっとうしろ

translation.en: Jolt! Electrify! Transplant those afterburners.
translation.ja: ジョルト アフターバーナーを移植だ

translation.en: Let's roll.
translation.ja: 出動だ！

translation.en: SOLDIER: Fire mission on the pyramids.
translation.ja: ピラミッドを攻撃！

translation.en: This planet will be dark forever.
translation.ja: この星を 永遠の暗黒で包め

translation.en: Die, like your brothers!
translation.ja: 死ね お前の兄弟のように

translation.en: They were your brothers, too.
translation.ja: お前にとっても兄弟だった

translation.en: Starscream!
translation.ja: スタースクリーム！

translation.en: You picked the wrong planet.
translation.ja: 地球を襲ったのが間違いだ

translation.en: Give me your face.
translation.ja: 顔をもいでやる

translation.en: I rise. You fall.
translation.ja: 私は立ち上がる お前は地獄へ堕ちるのだ

translation.en: No, no.
translation.ja: そんな まさか

translation.en: Not to call you a coward, Master,
translation.ja: あなたは臆病者ではない

translation.en: but sometimes cowards do survive.
translation.ja: ですが 時には臆病者が 生き延びるものです

translation.en: This isn't over.
translation.ja: これで終わりではない

translation.en: It took all this for you to tell me that you love me.
translation.ja: やっと“愛してる”って 言ったわね

translation.en: You said it first.
translation.ja: 君が先だった

translation.en: Thank you, Sam, for saving my life.
translation.ja: 礼を言う 命を救ってくれて

translation.en: Welcome. Thank you for believing in me.
translation.ja: いいんだ 信じてくれて ありがとう

translation.en: OPTIMUS: Our races united by a history long forgotten
translation.ja: 私たちと人類は― はるか大昔に結ばれていた

translation.en: and a future we shall face together.
translation.ja: 我々は未来へと 共に進んでゆくだろう

translation.en: I am Optimus Prime,
translation.ja: 私はオプティマス･プライム

translation.en: and I send this message so that our
translation.ja: このメッセージを― 我々の過去を 永遠に記憶するために送る

translation.en: pasts will always be remembered,
translation.ja: 我々の過去を 永遠に記憶するために送る

translation.en: for in those memories, we live on.
translation.ja: その記憶の中で 我々は生き続ける

translation.en: So glad you could join us, Professor Einstein.
translation.ja: よく戻ったな “アインシュタイン教授”

translation.en: (STUDENTS LAUGHING) Yeah, I was kind of busy.
translation.ja: 忙しかったので

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: ホントに
